title: Nashify
text:
Nashify is a game theory based on-spot inter college event designed and conducted by The KGPian Game Theory Society (KGTS) in Kshitij , the annual techno-management fest of IIT Kharagpur. Drawing from the success of the in-house event War of Wits , Nashify challenged the participants to outwit and outplay their opponents.
The event took place for first time on 1st and 2nd February 2014 and saw a participation from 146 teams (438 participants).
